tag_list: business-development, product-management, technology, auto-id, rfid, rubee, security
overview:
Craig Weich is Executive Vice President for Visible Assets.

Craig works closely with our licensees and partners to bring new RuBee solutions to the market across our lines of business including military, government, tools, and energy exploration. He also manages our worldwide Partner Sales efforts, including Oracle, ST Engineering, Mitac, and DDP. Craig brings over 15 years of experience building and delivering innovative technology products in a variety of industries. In previous roles, he has built solutions for companies ranging including AT&T, the Mayo Clinic and Coach. Craig began his career with General Electric and then joined US WEST’s research labs (now Qwest) where led a team of developers involved in large-scale networking applications. Since then he has been involved with entrepreneurial technology companies, including Emperative, a Greylock-funded network management software company that was acquired by AT&T in 2003. Craig holds a B.S. in Finance from the University of Vermont, an M.S. in Computer Science from the University of Colorado, and is a graduate of the General Electric Financial Management Program.
